programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Hooray For Handwriting: Capital Letters'. We learn to write capital letters. To get lesson notes on this episode send a whatsapp to +27 60 070 3328 with the code G1T3W3E2.

programme.title: Grade 2 Literacy
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Phonics: oi and oy'. We learn to use phonics like oi and oy.

programme.title: Grade 3 Literacy
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Pronouns'. We learn to use pronouns.

programme.title: Grade 4 Language
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Construction of simple sentences'. We learn to construct simple sentences.

programme.title: Grade 5 Language Repeat

programme.title: Grade 6 Language
programme.desc: 'S3/E12 - Using Proper Nouns'. We learn to use proper nouns.

programme.title: Grade 7 Mathematics

programme.desc: David Rubenstein explores the science of living longer by interviewing leading experts and examining the key barriers that still affect it: obesity, neurodegenerative diseases and cancer.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.desc: 'S10/E11 - Maryland Governor Wes Moore'. Maryland Governor Wes Moore. David Rubenstein in conversation with Maryland Governor Wes Moore.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer
programme.desc: 'S1/E1 - How New Magnets Could Power The Future'. The leading source of worldwide financial news, information, analysis and communication, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: 'S5/E3 - Murder On Rainbow Mountain'. Rainbow Mountain offers tourists a picture-perfect view that has flooded social media feeds. But behind this viral beauty spot is the story of a community at war and cries for help ignored.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer
programme.desc: 'S5/E3 - Pascal Desroches, AT&T'. AT&T CFO Pascal Desroches has partnered with CEO John Stankey to restructure the company around a core of fibre and 5G wireless connectivity.

programme.title: Bullish
programme.desc: 'S1/E5 - Wall Street Says It Can Fix The Housing Crisis'. Sonali Basak speaks with two of the most influential investors in American real estate to understand how private capital is reshaping the housing market.

programme.title: Longevity With David Rubenstein
programme.desc: David Rubenstein explores the science of living longer by interviewing leading experts and examining the key barriers that still affect it: obesity, neurodegenerative diseases and cancer.

programme.title: Bloomberg Originals
programme.desc: Exploring every angle of climate change, technology, finance, sports and beyond, Bloomberg Originals is business as you've never seen it.
